name: raceresult
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool formula_1_fixed.
Tool description: F1
API description: This endpoint gives the result for a specific race (round) in a season(year).


If the results for the specified race are not yet available the RaceTable element in the response will be empty.

round.description: The round number or name of the race in the F1 season.

year.description: The year of the F1 season.
